thread.title: Apple removes certain content blockers from iOS App Store over security concerns

title: Apple removes certain content blockers from iOS App Store over security concerns
text:
Apple removes certain content blockers from iOS App Store over security concerns 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Yesterday 
In a bid to protect users against potential man-in-the-middle attacks, Apple on Thursday confirmed the removal of multiple iOS content block...
